name: Far, far away...
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #30 48 Hour challenge: #LD48

Theme: Connected Worlds

Far, far away puts you in the place of an A.I. set to handle large scale decisions on board the generation starship I.S.C. Columbus. Every 10 years something happens that will require your attention and it's up to you to make the right decisions to ensure moral, food, water, oxygen, and ship maintenance all stay high enough to survive to your final destination.

Instructions: Click the buttons on the right or use A, B, C keys to select the option you want to choose. Press R to reset at any time. Monitor your resources and try to make the decision that will best benefit your colonists for the next ten years!
